item.title: 3,500 亿美元损失后，中国科技面临关税之外的担忧
item.description: 就在中国科技股开始收复近期的一些重大损失之际，一些投资者和分析师也在关注一些隐忧，这些隐忧可能会比唐纳德-特朗普的关税带来更严重的影响。【原文：Even as China’s tech stocks begin to recoup some of their recent big losses, some investors and analysts are eyeing looming concerns that may have a worse impact than Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 顶级预测师称人民币贬值呼声过高
item.description: Allan von Mehren 认为，中国很可能会不顾华尔街一些人对人民币兑美元大幅贬值的预期，而选择仅适度削弱这一管理货币。【原文：China is likely to defy expectations from some on Wall Street of big yuan devaluations against the dollar, opting instead to only moderately weaken the managed currency, according to Allan von Mehren.】

item.title: 英国在特朗普的不确定性中推动欧盟国防融资协议的达成
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将向欧盟同行表示，英国希望在国防融资方面加深合作，这是在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）使跨大西洋联盟关系紧张的刺激下，英国寻求与欧盟建立更紧密关系的最新尝试。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will tell European Union counterparts that Britain wants deeper cooperation on defense financing, the latest attempt to seek closer ties with the bloc spurred by President Donald Trump straining the transatlantic alliance.】

item.title: 英国招聘机构报告求职者人数创科维德事件以来最大增幅
item.description: 在英国找工作的求职者人数是自大流行病以来增长最多的一次，这是最明显的迹象之一，表明在国内企业面临成本压力和全球前景堪忧的情况下，劳动力市场正在降温。【原文：The pool of candidates looking for a job in Britain grew the most since the pandemic, one of the clearest signs yet that the labor market is cooling amid cost pressures for firms at home and a worrying global outlook.】

item.title: 房价昂贵导致伦敦人消费低于其他英国人
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，由于伦敦高昂的房租和房价，居住在伦敦的人在商品和服务上的花费少于普通英国人。【原文：People living in London are left with less to spend on goods and services than average Brits because of the capital’s exorbitant rent and house prices, a new report shows.】

item.title: 秘鲁央行权衡贸易战风险，维持关键利率不变
item.description: 秘鲁决策者周四维持利率不变，因为他们要评估美国和中国这两个最大贸易伙伴之间的贸易战以及席卷全球市场的动荡所带来的影响。【原文：Peru left interest rates unchanged on Thursday as policymakers gauge the impact of the trade war between the US and China — its two biggest trading partners — and the turmoil engulfing world markets.】

item.title: 经济衰退忧虑令交易商寻求避风港，黄金创下历史新高

item.title: 贸易战影响引发担忧，石油暴跌后趋于平稳
item.description: 由于投资者评估了美国贸易政策的最新突然转变及其对全球最大原油进口国中国需求的影响，石油创下本周最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held its biggest drop this week as investors assessed the latest abrupt shifts in US trade policy and their effects on demand in China, the world’s biggest crude importer.】

item.title: 市场综述：中美贸易争端升温导致股市和债券下挫
item.description: 美国股市和债券下跌，因为对中国进一步征收关税的紧张局势引发了全球市场的新一轮混乱，并波及大宗商品、货币和亚洲股票期货。【原文：US stocks and bonds fell after further tariff tension on China triggered fresh disorder in global markets that spread to commodities, currencies and Asian equity futures.】

item.title: 受中美贸易紧张局势影响，日本股市将重现跌势
item.description: 日本股市将追随美国股市的跌势，因为人们担心世界两大经济体之间不断升级的贸易战将拖累全球经济增长。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to track a slide in their US peers on concern that an escalating trade war between the world’s two biggest economies will slow global growth.】

item.title: 特朗普关税乱局来袭，让华尔街收益一落千丈
item.description: 玛丽-肖尔（Mari Shor）正在深入介绍唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税对她在哥伦比亚螺纹针公司（Columbia Threadneedle）分析的数十家消费公司意味着什么，有人打断了她。玛丽，关税暂停了，这位同事说，你所覆盖的股票正在飙升。【原文：Mari Shor was deep into a firm-wide presentation on what President Donald Trump’s tariffs meant for the dozens of consumer companies she analyzes at Columbia Threadneedle when someone interrupted her. Mari, the tariffs are paused, the colleague said, the stocks you cover are soaring.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构未对被黑客攻击的电子邮件账户采取保护措施
